Control Name: PERF 1.4 Use policies or reference architectures
Control Statement: Maximize performance and eﬃciency by evaluating internal policies and existing reference architectures and using your analysis to select services and conﬁgurations for your workload.

control_attributes.Control: PERF 1.4 Use policies or reference architectures
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you select the best performing architecture?
